Description: Ostracon, large section (2 fragments joined) of the body of a red pottery jar with slightly convex sides, the fabric is relatively coarse and contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip, with remains of a light-brown painted zone, and remains of at least nine lines of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Thoth 'Great of 5' Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393500) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393500)
